00016 #include "Minet.h"

00018 using std::cout;
00019 using std::cerr;
00020 using std::endl;
00021 
00022 
00023 struct UDPState {
00024   std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &os) const { os <<"UDPState()"; return os;}
00025 
00026   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const UDPState& L) {
00027     return L.Print(os);
00028   }
00029 };
00030 
00031 
00032 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00033 {
00034   MinetHandle mux;
00035   MinetHandle sock;
00036 
00037   ConnectionList<UDPState> clist;
00038 
00039   MinetInit(MINET_UDP_MODULE);
00040 
00041   mux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) ? MinetConnect(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00042   sock=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00043 
00044   if (mux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX)) {
00045     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ip_mux"));
00046     return -1;
00047   }
00048   if (sock==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE)) {
00049     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from sock_module"));
00050     return -1;
00051   }
00052 
00053   cerr << "udp_module handling udp traffic.......\n";
00054 
00055   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("udp_module handling udp traffic........"));
00056 
00057   MinetEvent event;
00058 
00059   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00060     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
00061         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00062       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00063     } else {
00064       if (event.handle==mux) {
00065         Packet p;
00066         unsigned short len;
00067         bool checksumok;
00068         MinetReceive(mux,p);
00069         p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<UDPHeader>(8);
00070         UDPHeader udph;
00071         udph=p.FindHeader(Headers::UDPHeader);
00072         checksumok=udph.IsCorrectChecksum(p);
00073         IPHeader iph;
00074         iph=p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00075         Connection c;
00076         // note that this is flipped around because
00077         // "source" is interepreted as "this machine"
00078         iph.GetDestIP(c.src);
00079         iph.GetSourceIP(c.dest);
00080         iph.GetProtocol(c.protocol);
00081         udph.GetDestPort(c.srcport);
00082         udph.GetSourcePort(c.destport);
00083         ConnectionList<UDPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(c);
00084         if (cs!=clist.end()) {
00085           udph.GetLength(len);
00086           len-=UDP_HEADER_LENGTH;
00087           Buffer &data = p.GetPayload().ExtractFront(len);
00088           SockRequestResponse write(WRITE,
00089                                     (*cs).connection,
00090                                     data,
00091                                     len,
00092                                     EOK);
00093           if (!checksumok) {
00094             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("forwarding packet to sock even though checksum failed"));
00095           }
00096           MinetSend(sock,write);
00097         } else {
00098           MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown port, sending ICMP error message"));
00099           IPAddress source; iph.GetSourceIP(source);
00100           ICMPPacket error(source,DESTINATION_UNREACHABLE,PORT_UNREACHABLE,p);
00101           MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ICMP error message has been sent to host"));
00102           MinetSend(mux, error);
00103         }
00104       }
00105       if (event.handle==sock) {
00106         SockRequestResponse req;
00107         MinetReceive(sock,req);
00108         switch (req.type) {
00109         case CONNECT:
00110         case ACCEPT:
00111           { // ignored, send OK response
00112             SockRequestResponse repl;
00113             repl.type=STATUS;
00114             repl.connection=req.connection;
00115             // buffer is zero bytes
00116             repl.bytes=0;
00117             repl.error=EOK;
00118             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00119           }
00120           break;
00121         case STATUS:
00122           // ignored, no response needed
00123           break;
00124           // case SockRequestResponse::WRITE:
00125         case WRITE:
00126           {
00127             unsigned bytes = MIN_MACRO(UDP_MAX_DATA, req.data.GetSize());
00128             // create the payload of the packet
00129             Packet p(req.data.ExtractFront(bytes));
00130             // Make the IP header first since we need it to do the udp checksum
00131             IPHeader ih;
00132             ih.SetProtocol(IP_PROTO_UDP);
00133             ih.SetSourceIP(req.connection.src);
00134             ih.SetDestIP(req.connection.dest);
00135             ih.SetTotalLength(bytes+UDP_HEADER_LENGTH+IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00136             // push it onto the packet
00137             p.PushFrontHeader(ih);
00138             // Now build the UDP header
00139             // notice that we pass along the packet so that the udpheader can find
00140             // the ip header because it will include some of its fields in the checksum
00141             UDPHeader uh;
00142             uh.SetSourcePort(req.connection.srcport,p);
00143             uh.SetDestPort(req.connection.destport,p);
00144             uh.SetLength(UDP_HEADER_LENGTH+bytes,p);
00145             // Now we want to have the udp header BEHIND the IP header
00146             p.PushBackHeader(uh);
00147             MinetSend(mux,p);
00148             SockRequestResponse repl;
00149             // repl.type=SockRequestResponse::STATUS;
00150             repl.type=STATUS;
00151             repl.connection=req.connection;
00152             repl.bytes=bytes;
00153             repl.error=EOK;
00154             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00155           }
00156           break;
00157           // case SockRequestResponse::FORWARD:
00158         case FORWARD:
00159           {
00160             ConnectionToStateMapping<UDPState> m;
00161             m.connection=req.connection;
00162             // remove any old forward that might be there.
00163             ConnectionList<UDPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00164             if (cs!=clist.end()) {
00165               clist.erase(cs);
00166             }
00167             clist.push_back(m);
00168             SockRequestResponse repl;
00169             // repl.type=SockRequestResponse::STATUS;
00170             repl.type=STATUS;
00171             repl.connection=req.connection;
00172             repl.error=EOK;
00173             repl.bytes=0;
00174             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00175           }
00176           break;
00177           // case SockRequestResponse::CLOSE:
00178         case CLOSE:
00179           {
00180             ConnectionList<UDPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00181             SockRequestResponse repl;
00182             repl.connection=req.connection;
00183             // repl.type=SockRequestResponse::STATUS;
00184             repl.type=STATUS;
00185             if (cs==clist.end()) {
00186               repl.error=ENOMATCH;
00187             } else {
00188               repl.error=EOK;
00189               clist.erase(cs);
00190             }
00191             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00192           }
00193           break;
00194         default:
00195           {
00196             SockRequestResponse repl;
00197             // repl.type=SockRequestResponse::STATUS;
00198             repl.type=STATUS;
00199             repl.error=EWHAT;
00200             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00201           }
00202         }
00203       }
00204     }
00205   }
00206   return 0;
00207 }
